arabic: فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
footnotes: Wala mali waliyo yachuma na majumba waliyo yajenga hayakuwalinda na hilaki iliyo wateremkia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: famā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūna
